title: 4.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create a function to evaluate the average of two numbers a and b. Call the function to find the average of the following pairs of numbers:
(a) 45, 90
(b) -30, 30
(c) 25, 75
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
